tasks.name: CineSynth: Connect Database
tasks.description:
[01/27/2026 14:16] ðŸ“¥ Task created

Connect CineSynth to PostgreSQL and enable persistence.

**Steps:**
1. Add DATABASE_URL to .env.local (Neon/Supabase)
2. Run npx prisma db push to create tables
3. Replace in-memory auth with Prisma queries
4. Wire frontend to save projects

**Reference:** brain/projects/cinesynth-roadmap.md

tasks.name: HeartCap Phase 1: Create Supabase Project
tasks.description:
[01/27/2026 14:16] ðŸ“¥ Task created

Create production Supabase project for HeartCap-Recruiter.

**Steps:**
1. Go to supabase.com, create new project
2. Note Project URL, anon key, service role key
3. Run the 3 migration SQL files from supabase/migrations/
4. Verify tables created with RLS policies

**Reference:** brain/projects/heartcap-deployment-prep.md
